Constant Field Values

multiBinaryExecutor

public ExecutorService multiBinaryExecutor
Executor used to run the individual binary training and classification tasks in multi-binary mode. If this is not set, MultiClassLearning will simply run the tasks sequentially in its main thread, but as the binary tasks are independent they could instead be run in a thread pool.

verbosityLogService

public int verbosityLogService
The verbosity level for writing information into log file. 0: no real output. 1: normal output including results and setting information. 2: warning information.
